profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 13:25:40 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: An artificial collection documents the influence of the Vietnam War on the SUNY Albany campus..
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Like many other colleges and universities throughout America, The State University of New York at Albany saw its share of protests on the Vietnam War and related events during the late 1960s and into the 1970s. Murmurs of protest began as early as 1967 and continued even after the United States began drawing down troop levels in the 1970s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This artificial collection is primarily made up of flyers and posters found on campus relating to the war. There are also files containing correspondence, newspapers, and publications on the Vietnam War.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection was maintained in its original order upon processing.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All items in this collection were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: This page may contain links to digital objects. Access to these images and the technical capacity to download them does not imply permission for re-use. Digital objects may be used freely for personal reference use, referred to, or linked to from other web sites.
Researchers do not have permission to publish or disseminate material from these collections without permission from an archivist and/or the copyright holder.

More information about U.S. Copyright is provided by the Copyright Office. Additionally, re-use may be restricted by terms of University Libraries gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks.

The M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collection and Archives is eager to hear from any copyright owners who are not properly identified so that appropriate information may be provided in the future.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Vietnam War Collection, 1967-1973. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Vietnam War Collection).
